recipe.recipe_name: Grilled Chicken Salad with Avocado Dressing
recipe.ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 1 teaspoon olive oil, Salt and pepper, to taste, 4 cups mixed salad greens, 1/2 cucumber, sliced, 1/2 bell pepper, chopped, 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/2 avocado, 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, 1/4 cup Greek yogurt, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1 garlic clove
recipe.directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Brush chicken breasts with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill chicken for 5-7 minutes on each side or until cooked through and juices run clear. Let it rest for 5 minutes and then slice, In a blender, combine avocado, cilantro, Greek yogurt, lime juice, garlic, and a pinch of salt. Blend until smooth to make the dressing, Arrange mixed salad greens on a plate and top with cucumber, bell pepper, and red onion. Place sliced chicken on top of the salad, Drizzle with avocado dressing and serve immediately.
